promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive rare tortoise water-type pokemon wearing ornate gemstones. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or tortoise. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemqua, a a massive rare tortoise water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Icicle Punch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "tortoise", "water" or "Gemqua". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, tortoise-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, aurora background
generatedDescription: This colossal marine dweller uses Icicle Punch to shatter iceberg obstacles. Found mainly in oceanic realms, its rarity dazzles many trainers.
